Name: Samousas's Treasure
Description: Samousas stash was washed downstream. To fulfill his childhood dream, he asks you to retrieve the lost box.
QuestDesc: Samousas stash was washed downstream. To fulfill his childhood dream, he asks you to retrieve the lost box.

Dialogues.Speaker: Samousas
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How could it just disappear like that?! I'm 100% sure it was right here a moment ago!

Dialogues.Speaker: Samousas
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How could this happen? My money! My money, my soul... My only hope!

Dialogues.Speaker: Samousas
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The money I hid here is gone, but there aren't any other footprints here. Did it get washed downstream?

Dialogues.Speaker: Samousas
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You look quite nimble, my friend. Perhaps you could help me? If you could find my money for me, I'd be happy to repay your efforts.

Options.PlotLineKey: Why don't you contact the bank?

Dialogues.Speaker: Samousas
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're a lifesaver! If you just follow down the river, I'm sure you'll find clues!

Dialogues.Speaker: Samousas
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Because... my family doesn't know that I play Peaks of Prestige! And if they were to check my bank records...

Dialogues.Speaker: Samousas
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If people find out I was using all of my salary to buy limited edition card packs... As an adult, that's equivalent to a death sentence!

Dialogues.Speaker: Samousas
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But if someone were to ask me to give up my Peaks of Prestige addiction... No, that's impossible! A life without PoP would be as meaningless as living as a Tacet Discord!

Dialogues.Speaker: Samousas
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm begging you, great guest from afar! Just follow the river and I'm sure you'll find something!

Dialogues.Speaker: Samousas
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My benefactor! My savior! Oh, thank you! Thank you! You've found it!

Dialogues.Speaker: Samousas
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now I'm one step closer to buying my next card pack... And if I finally manage to draw that Echo card, I'll become the ultimate duel master!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just as Samousas thanks you, a woman walks over to you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Favnia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Samousas? What're you doing here? Did I just hear you yell "card pack" and "ultimate duel master"? What's this all about?

Dialogues.Speaker: Favnia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're not planning on playing Peaks of Prestige, are you? And where'd you get that money from?

Dialogues.Speaker: Samousas
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Eek! Favnia! I-I didn't... I'm n-not... This is not my money! My friend here was asking me for some safekeeping! A-And I was just about to give it back to you, isn't that right?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Samousas give you a look.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...That's right, of course.

Dialogues.Speaker: Favnia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, is it now? Then you'd best give it back, Samousas!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With great pain, Samousas hands you the box of money before being dragged away by Favnia...

Dialogues.Speaker: Samousas
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My benefactor! My savior! Oh, thank you! Thank you! You've found it!
